title: Land mine free Sri Lanka: Army launches Mine Awareness Programme at Nagarkovil in Jaffna
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma The Government of Sri Lanka completed the resettling of all internally displaced people (IDPs) after demining the lands earlier used by Tamil Tiger terrorists in Jaffna Peninsula. On successful completion of early resettlement, Security Forces Headquarters – Jaffna has planned to launch a Mine Risk Education and Mine Awareness…
